name: Area 51: 09/20/19
description:
You are a weeb trying to run to the area 51. On your way you will find some journalists you can interact with. They will talk about your movement, make some BUZZ and other weebs will join you out. Can you reach the area 51 and discover what is inside ?

We are two friends. We made this game for the BRACKEY GameJam, whose theme was "Stronger Together".

Antoine Lag has made the graphic part and I, Mathias Davril, have made all the code, level design...

We took all the musics and sounds on freesound.org
